    • Immigration

Australia has a long history of welcoming migrants and visitors from all over the world. Some come temporarily as tourists or to visit relatives and friends, some take advantage of Australia’s excellent high schools and universities while others come as employees or to start a business. Many people who come to Australia temporarily decide they want to remain permanently.

Regardless of your reason, if you would like to come to Australia either temporarily or permanently, short stay or long stay, Australia Asian Sunlight Company (AASUNCO) offers a full range of Australian visa and migration services. Our registered migration agents will draw on their many years of Australian immigration expertise to professionally advise you on your options.

Australian immigration law is complex and constantly changing, there are over one hundred types of visas you can apply for. Applying for the wrong visa can be costly. We can guide you through the entire process, from choosing the right visa to suit your individual circumstances and preparing your application right through to the final interview and obtaining your visa.

You are welcome to contact us with any questions you may have. Whether your goal is simply to study or travel in Australia for a short time or for your family to live permanently in Australia, we can assist you in achieving your objective.

Under Australian law anybody offering migration advice must be registered with the government. Only persons who pass the strict requirements of the Migration Agents Registration Authority (MARA) are allowed to be registered. We are members of the Migration Institute of Australia and all our advisers are registered migration agents bound to abide by MARA’s Code of Conduct.
